fields.label: Mission Statement
fields.name: mission_statement
fields.instructions: Add text for the mission statement, it will appear at the top of the page.

fields.label: Show Telephone Number
fields.name: contact_show_telephone
fields.instructions: Select this box to show the telephone number on the contact page.

fields.label: Show Address
fields.name: contact_show_address
fields.instructions: Select this box to show the telephone number on the contact page.

fields.label: Content
fields.name: content
fields.instructions: Add the content for the post.

fields.label: Style
fields.name: style
fields.instructions: Select a style for the hero section.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions: Add the main heading text for the page.

fields.label: Video
fields.name: video
fields.instructions: Add a video for the hero section in MP4, WebM & OGG Formats. Include a poster image for desktop & mobile.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Add a background image for the hero section.

fields.label: Parallax Image
fields.name: parallax
fields.instructions: Optional: Add a parallax image for the full height hero. It should be the same size as the main image.

fields.label: Content
fields.name: content
fields.instructions: Add content for the hero section.

fields.label: Small Heading
fields.name: small_heading
fields.instructions: Add a small heading for the hero.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.instructions: Add a logo that will be displayed in the header.

fields.label: Address
fields.name: contact_address
fields.instructions: Add Tif Groups address.

fields.label: Telephone Number
fields.name: contact_telephone
fields.instructions: Add Tif Groups telephone number.

fields.label: Informed Text
fields.name: contact_informed_text
fields.instructions: Add content for the first checkbox on the contact form.

fields.label: GDPR Text
fields.name: contact_gdpr_text
fields.instructions: Add content for the second checkbox on the contact form.

fields.label: Thank you message
fields.name: contact_thankyou
fields.instructions: Enter copy that will be displayed after successful submission of contact forms.

fields.label: From Address
fields.name: from_address
fields.instructions: Add an email address that will be sent 'from' when emails are sent to the recipent. Only add the first word '@tifgroup.co.uk' will be appended. E.g. admin will result in admin@tifgroup.co.uk

fields.label: Recipients
fields.name: recipients
fields.instructions: Add an email address for each department. The contact us email will be sent to a department depending on the users selection.

fields.label: Footer Disclosure
fields.name: footer_disclosure
fields.instructions: Add a footer disclosure, it will appear in the middle of the primary footer.

fields.label: Footer Image Left
fields.name: footer_image_left
fields.instructions: Add an image for the right side of the footer.

fields.label: Footer Image Right
fields.name: footer_image_right
fields.instructions: Add an image for the right side of the footer.

fields.label: LinkedIn
fields.name: linkedin
fields.instructions: Add Tif Groups LinkedIn URL.

fields.label: Facebook
fields.name: facebook
fields.instructions: Add Tif Groups Facebook URL.

fields.label: Twitter
fields.name: twitter
fields.instructions: Add Tif Groups Twitter URL.

fields.label: Customers Image
fields.name: nav_customers_image
fields.instructions: Add an image that will appear on hover (desktop screens only) in the nav for the customers section.

fields.label: Business Image
fields.name: nav_business_image
fields.instructions: Add an image that will appear on hover (desktop screens only) in the nav for the business section.

fields.label: Careers Image
fields.name: nav_careers_image
fields.instructions: Add an image that will appear on hover (desktop screens only) in the nav for the careers section.

fields.label: Text
fields.name: 404_text
fields.instructions: Add text that will sit below the 404 message.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: 404_button_text
fields.instructions: Add text that will appear inside the home link button.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: 404_image
fields.instructions: Add a full screen background image for the 404 page.

fields.label: Header Scripts
fields.name: header_scripts
fields.instructions: Paste scripts in raw format that will appear in the <head> of the site.

fields.label: Footer Scripts
fields.name: footer_scripts
fields.instructions: Paste scripts in raw format that will appear in the footer of the site.

fields.label: No JS Text
fields.name: no_js_text
fields.instructions: Add text that will appear in the banner if the user has Javascript enabled.

fields.label: Header Link Left
fields.name: header_link_left
fields.instructions: Add a link that will appear in the header on the left.

fields.label: Header Link Middle
fields.name: header_link_middle
fields.instructions: Add a link that will appear in the header in the middle.

fields.label: Header Link Right
fields.name: header_link_right
fields.instructions: Add a link that will appear in the header on the right.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: bg_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the block, if none selected, it will default to white.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: position
sub_fields.instructions: Select where the mission statement will sit, left or right.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: bg_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the block, if none selected, it will default to white.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select a style for the introduction text.

sub_fields.label: Small Heading
sub_fields.name: small_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Add a sub heading for the introduction text, it will appear above the title.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select a style of rich text.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: bg_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the block, if none selected, it will default to white.

sub_fields.label: Large/Small
sub_fields.name: large
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the rich text should span 6 or 8 columns on large screens.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Add a title to sit above the two column text.

sub_fields.label: Small Heading
sub_fields.name: small_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Add a small heading to sit above the two column text.

sub_fields.label: Text Editor
sub_fields.name: text_editor
sub_fields.instructions:
H6 (Heading 6) for Subtitle,
H4 (Heading 4) for Title,
P tags for main content.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select a style of card.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: bg_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the block, if none selected, it will default to white.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image for the card.

sub_fields.label: Text Colour
sub_fields.name: text_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select the text colour that sits inside the card, normal is default formatting with primary colours.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
Add the main content for the card.
H6 (Heading 6) for Subtitle,
H4 (Heading 4) for Title,
P tags for main content.

sub_fields.label: Add Button?
sub_fields.name: add_button
sub_fields.instructions: Select if a button is to appear below the main content.

sub_fields.instructions: Add text that will appear within the button.

sub_fields.name: small_heading

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content

sub_fields.name: tablet_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image for the business card suitable for tablets (horizontal).

sub_fields.label: Small Heading
sub_fields.name: small_heading

sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for the logo reel.

sub_fields.name: logo_gallery

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Add a title for the case study cards.

sub_fields.label: Case Study
sub_fields.name: case_study
sub_fields.instructions: Select a case study to display, you can select a minimum of one, and a maximum of two.

sub_fields.label: Secondary Content
sub_fields.name: secondary_content
sub_fields.instructions: This content should be used in conjunction with the single case studies page.

sub_fields.label: Badge Title
sub_fields.name: badge_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for the badge, appears in capital letters.

sub_fields.label: Badge Content
sub_fields.name: badge_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add text for the content of the badge, appears in a smaller font.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add the main content for the block-quote.

sub_fields.label: Source
sub_fields.name: source
sub_fields.instructions: Add the source of the block-quote.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add an image for the case study, it will appear as a large image, overlapping on the next section.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Add a title for the big numbers section.

sub_fields.label: Number
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: Add a number.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add supplementary text for the section.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select a style of icon section.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: bg_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the block, if none selected, it will default to white.

sub_fields.label: Number of Icons
sub_fields.name: number_of_icons
sub_fields.instructions: Select how many icons to show per row, 4 or 5.

sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
Optional: Add content for the icon section, it will sit above the icons.
H6 (Heading 6) for Subtitle,
H4 (Heading 4) for Title,
P tags for main content.

sub_fields.name: content

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title

sub_fields.name: modal_content

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select a style of flip card.

sub_fields.name: card_content
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether to content for the cards is manual, or by taxonomy.

sub_fields.name: overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether the front card should have a dark overlay, suitable for full screen images with white text.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content

Optional: Add content for the flip cards section, it will appear above the flip cards.
H6 (Heading 6) for Subtitle,

P tags for main content.

sub_fields.name: title

sub_fields.name: content

sub_fields.name: back_image
sub_fields.instructions: Add a header image that will appear on the back of the card at the top.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for the selector.

sub_fields.label: History Content
sub_fields.name: history_content

Add content that will sit on the left hand side of the timeline.
H6 (Heading 6) for Subtitle,
H4 (Heading 4) for Title,
P tags for main content.

sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for the timeline event.

sub_fields.name: bg_colour

sub_fields.label: Title

sub_fields.label: FAQ Category
sub_fields.name: taxonomy
sub_fields.instructions: Select what category of FAQs you would like to display.
